    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The seasons in relation to the earrths rotation and the sun.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Jahreszeiten in Beziehung zu der earrths 
Umdrehung und der Sonne.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les saisons par rapport à la rotation d'earrths et
au soleil.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As estações com relação à rotação dos 
earrths e ao sol.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le stagioni rispetto alla rotazione di earrths ed 
al sole.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εποχές σε σχέση με την περιστροφή earrths και τον
ήλιο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las estaciones en lo referente a la rotación de 
los earrths y al sol.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the relation between the changing seasons to the Earth's axial tilt</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">climates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meteorology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Relation zwischen dem Ändern 
zeigt, würzt zur axialen Neigung der Masse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la relation entre changer 
assaisonne à l'inclinaison axiale de la terre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a relação entre a mudança 
seasons à inclinação axial da terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il rapporto fra cambiare 
condisce all'inclinazione assiale della terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη σχέση μεταξύ των 
μεταβαλλόμενων εποχών με τη γήινη αξονική κλίση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la relación entre cambiar 
sazona a la inclinación axial de la tierra</string>
          </description>
